name: Educative
description: Educative is a platform for online learning of coding skills through interactive, hands-on courses and so much more.

item.name: Grokking Modern System Design Interview
item.description: Everything you need for Grokking the System Design Interview, developed by FAANG engineers. Master distributed system fundamentals and practice real-world interview questions.

item.name: Grokking the Coding Interview Patterns
item.description: Grokking the Coding Interview is the best course that saves countless hours wasted in grinding LeetCode. Master 28 coding patterns; unlock all LeetCode problems. Developed by and for MAANG engineers.

item.name: Grokking the Mobile System Design Interview
item.description: Grokking the Mobile System Design Interview is a course created by industry engineers that teaches you how to design scalable, resilient, user-centric mobile systems.

item.name: Agentic System Design
item.description: Learn to design the next generation of AI systems. Explore the architectures and strategies behind autonomous agents that solve complex, real-world problems.

item.name: Learn Data Analysis
item.description: This course equips you with the skills to access, clean, analyze, and visualize data using SQL and Python, preparing you to launch your career in data analysis.

item.name: Learn Data Engineering
item.description: This course covers the essentials of data engineering, from handling structured and unstructured data to designing scalable systems with Hadoop, Spark, and Kafka.

item.name: Llama Stack: From Fundamentals to Deployment
item.description: This course guides you through Llama Stack and its key components, including agentic workflows, RAG systems, safety mechanisms, monitoring, and deployment.

item.name: Master AWS Certified Developer – Associate (DVA-C02) Exam
item.description: Become an AWS pro with the AWS Developer – Associate (DVA-C02) course. Get hands-on experience that requires no setup, clean up, or hassle.

description: Learn coding with AI-powered online courses. Educative.io offers a vast catalog designed to keep you engaged and advancing.
headline: Online Coding Courses - AI-Powered Interactive Learning
